applicant-name.name: SHENZHEN QIANYI HYDROGEN ENERGY CO LTD
深圳市千懿氢能有限责任公司

invention-title: Composite material bipolar plate internal humidifying fuel cell
一种复合材料双极板内增湿燃料电池

abstract.p: The invention discloses a composite material bipolar plate internal humidification fuel cell, which is characterized in that according to the humidification and drainage characteristic requirements required by the work of the fuel cell, a compact graphite plate or a metal plate is adopted as an anode plate for conveying hydrogen, a groove is processed, and the anode plate is waterproof and airtight under a certain pressure; the negative plate for conveying air adopts a porous graphite plate or a laser-punched metal plate, grooves are processed, and the negative plate with a porous structure can realize a bidirectional permeation function of circulating water under the control of air and water pressure and flow velocity on two sides of the negative plate, so that the circulating water can permeate to the air side through the porous negative plate to wet a membrane electrode, and the circulating water can permeate to the air side through the porous negative plate to permeate the membrane electrode. And the generated liquid water can permeate to the circulating water side from the diffusion layer of the membrane electrode and the micropores of the porous cathode plate under the action of pressure and capillary, and is discharged along with the circulating water, so that the water content of the membrane electrode is bidirectionally adjusted, the stability and the safety of the cell are improved, the service life of the cell is prolonged, and an auxiliary system of a fuel cell engine is simplified.

本发明公开了一种复合材料双极板内增湿燃料电池，根据燃料电池工作需要的增湿、排水特性要求，输送氢气的阳极板采用致密石墨板或金属板，并加工出沟槽，且阳极板在一定压力下达到不透水、不透气，输送空气的阴极板采用多孔石墨板或激光打孔的金属板，并加工出沟槽，且多孔结构的阴极板可以通过其两侧的空气和水压力、流速的控制下，实现循环水的双向渗透功能，既可以使循环水透过多孔阴极板渗透到空气侧，侵湿膜电极，又可以将生成的液态水通过压力和毛细作用，从膜电极的扩散层、多孔阴极板的微孔渗透到循环水侧，随循环水排出，起到对膜电极含水量的双向调节，不仅提高电池的稳定性、安全性和使用寿命，又简化燃料电池发动机辅助系统。
